name: EcovacsDeebot
0:
”Alexa, ask DEEBOT to start cleaning.”
”Alexa, ask DEEBOT to stop cleaning.”
”Alexa, ask DEEBOT to return to dock.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: deebot
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Cleaning your floor has never been easier than it is now! The DEEBOT allows you to clean your entire house without lifting a finger! 
To get started, make sure you have an ECOVACS account registered in the ECOVACS App and your DEEBOT is connected and online. Then, you just need to enable the ECOVACS skill by clicking on the “Enable” button. Once you’re all set up, simply give your DEEBOT a command and it’ll take care of the rest. 
Below are some of the voice commands you can use to control what your DEEBOT does in your home. Your DEEBOT will start, stop, give updates, dock, get battery level, set suction power, and clean where you tell it to.
 
START
- "Alexa, ask DEEBOT to start cleaning."
- "Alexa, ask DEEBOT to start vacuuming."
- "Alexa, ask DEEBOT to start mopping."
- "Alexa, tell DEEBOT it missed a spot."
- "Alexa, tell DEEBOT the house isn’t going to clean itself."
- "Alexa, ask DEEBOT to start vacuuming with kitty."
- "Alexa, ask DEEBOT to start mopping with kitty."

 STOP
- "Alexa, ask DEEBOT to stop cleaning."
- "Alexa, ask DEEBOT to stop vacuuming."
- "Alexa, ask DEEBOT to stop mopping."
- "Alexa, tell DEEBOT it’s fired."
- "Alexa, tell DEEBOT its services are no longer needed."
- "Alexa, ask DEEBOT to stop vacuuming with kitty."
- "Alexa, ask DEEBOT to stop mopping with kitty."

PAUSE
- "Alexa, ask DEEBOT to pause vacuuming."
- "Alexa, ask DEEBOT to pause mopping."
- "Alexa, tell DEEBOT to take a breather."
- "Alexa, tell DEEBOT to wait just a moment."
- "Alexa, tell DEEBOT that Simon says ‘freeze’."
- "Alexa, ask DEEBOT to pause vacuuming with kitty."
- "Alexa, ask DEEBOT to pause mopping with kitty."
 
LOCATE
- "Alexa, ask DEEBOT where it is?"
- "Alexa, tell DEEBOT it has 10 seconds to show its face."
- "Alexa, tell DEEBOT I miss it."
- "Alexa, tell DEEBOT I said Marco."
 
STATUS
- "Alexa, ask DEEBOT what’s its status?"
- "Alexa, tell DEEBOT I haven’t heard from it in a while"
- "Alexa, ask DEEBOT how much longer until it’s done?"
 
DOCK
- "Alexa, ask DEEBOT to return to dock."
- "Alexa, ask DEEBOT to return to the charging dock."
- "Alexa, tell DEEBOT I said goodnight."
- "Alexa, tell DEEBOT it’s time to hit the sack."
- "Alexa, tell DEEBOT it’s past its bedtime."
- "Alexa, ask DEEBOT to start charging with kitty."
 
AREA CLEANING
- "Alexa, ask DEEBOT to vacuum the guest room."
- "Alexa, ask DEEBOT to mop the master bedroom."
- "Alexa, tell DEEBOT the kid’s room is waiting for it."
- "Alexa, tell DEEBOT the kids made a little mess in the kitchen."
- "Alexa, ask DEEBOT to clean bedroom."
- "Alexa, ask DEEBOT to clean bedroom with kitty."

Get battery level
- "Alexa, ask DEEBOT what is the battery level of Kitty?"
- "Alexa, ask DEEBOT how much power is remaining?"

Set suction power
- "Alexa, tell DEEBOT to set suction power to max on Kitty."
- "Alexa, ask DEEBOT to clean in quite mode."
- "Alexa, ask DEEBOT to clean with the biggest power."
- "Alexa, ask DEEBOT to change vacuum power to standard."

*"Kitty" is the sample custom robot name, which means you can rename your DEEBOT, and control it with the new name through Alexa. 
For more information about how DEEBOT connected works with Alexa, go to https://www.ecovacs.com.
